taskDescription:
Find the sum of the first 30 terms, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>s</mi>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <mn>30</mn>
      </mrow>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{s_{30}}</annotation></semantics></math>, for the arithmetic sequence with first term <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>a</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>4</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{a_1} =  - 4</annotation></semantics></math> and common difference <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>d</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>3.5</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">d = 3.5</annotation></semantics></math>.
